ev3dev.hardware.sensor.ev3

Class EV3TouchSensor

  • java.lang.Object
    • ev3dev.hardware.Device
      • ev3dev.hardware.EV3DevSysfs
        • ev3dev.hardware.EV3DevDevice
          • ev3dev.hardware.sensor.BaseSensor
            • ev3dev.hardware.sensor.ev3.EV3TouchSensor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SensorMode, SensorModes, java.io.Closeable, java.lang.AutoCloseable, SampleProvider

    public class EV3TouchSensor
extends BaseSensor
    Lego EV3 Touch sensor
    The analog EV3 Touch Sensor is a simple but exceptionally precise tool that detects when its front button is pressed or released. *

    Supported modes
    Mode name Description unit(s) Getter
    Touch Detects when its front button is pressed Binary getTouchMode()
    See Sensor Product page See The leJOS sensor framework See leJOS conventions for SampleProviders

      • getTouchMode

        public SensorMode getTouchMode()
        Lego EV3 Touch sensor, Touch mode
        Detects when its front button is pressed

        Size and content of the sample
        The sample contains one element, a value of 0 indicates that the button is not presse, a value of 1 indicates the button is pressed.

        Returns:
        A sampleProvider See leJOS conventions for SampleProviders
